id.description: id: the identifier of the DO.

type.description: type: the DO type. Must be 0.TYPE/DO or its extension. See Types section.

attributes.description: attributes: one or more fields (key-value pairs) serialized as a JSON (sub) object.

id.description: id: identifier of the element; must be unique within a DO.

type.description: shall be a type as defined in this spec or a MIME type

attributes.description: one or more fields serialized as an object using the default serialization, or as a JSON (sub) object.

elements.description: description: one or more elements serialized as an array in the default serialization, with each element consisting of

signatures.description: Required for DOs of type 0.TYPE/DOIPServiceInfo and 0.TYPE/DOIPOperation; otherwise optional. The field is an array of strings in the default serialization; each string is in JWS format19 with an unencoded detached payload.

description: Any DO communicated via DOIP must be serialized using the DOIP Serialization. The order of serialization of the various fields as defined next are not important.
